name: Crumblord Classics Pack
description:
A smasha from the past-a!

Take a trip back to the olden days of the Wonderswan, and play the 10 smash hit Crumblord games that your everyone and your grandma remembers! Originally lost to time, the now-named Crumblord Classics Pack has been remastered, translated, dug-up, reprogrammed, reproduced, and ported to PC! Experience the wonderful classics of 1999 for the first time or for another trip through! Featuring the amazing classics :  Crumblord And Harmony, Crumblord Xenoglossia, Crumblord Sleep Simulator, Crumblord Commits Voter Fraud, Crumblord Q, Crumblord and the Labyrinth of Buttons, Crumb, Crumblord Aislehopper, and Crumblord Bible Stories! Each game offers an incredibly unique and colorful experience worthy of much discussion and love. What are you waiting for? Jump right into one of any Crumblord Adventure with a click of a button!

Amazingly crafted cover art drawn by ToadDan! An amazing recreation of the original cover art! You can find his twitter where he'll be posting facts about original Crumblord development here : https://twitter.com/ToadDan_  (he wont)

Problems with your experience?  Contact https://twitter.com/ThePhoboMeat ! Shoot him a message or @ him and we'll do what we can to help you however we can!

(Also, be sure to install RPGmaker VX ace + MV RTP, found here :
https://www.rpgmakerweb.com/run-time-package)
